title: Normalize blog media URLs to drop /static prefix
scope: Normalize blog media URLs returned from uploads to remove the leading /static prefix
Ensure featured image values and placeholders use /uploads paths
Record the update in the changelog
acceptance_criteria: Blog media upload responses provide /uploads/blog/* URLs (no /static prefix)
Featured image values saved from the admin UI do not include the /static prefix
CHANGELOG.md includes an entry for this work order
risk_notes: Existing posts with /static paths may still render until edited or re-uploaded
rollback_plan: Revert the URL normalization changes and restore /static in upload responses
